Your origin and background are defined by the Garou class. You are a werewolfâ€”a warrior of Gaia. Your Tribe, Auspice, and Breed (and any background skills or flavor) are represented by the Garou class, subclass, and Breed feat rather than a separate core-rule background.

Use this placeholder so the character sheet shows that background benefits come from the Garou class and your choices (Tribe, Auspice, Breed).
